result.title: Invitation to HackerEarth September Easy
result.content:
Hello problem solvers!

I'm glad to invite you to participate in HackerEarth September Easy Challenge. it will start on 9:30 PM IST, link of the contest: September Easy Challenge

There will be 6 algorithmic problems of varying difficulties (from easy to medium-hard) and you will be given 3 hours to solve them, each problem is worth 100 points and partial points is allowed (you will be given points of each test case you pass). Top 5 beginners will receive HackerEarth T-shirts.

Problems are set by _shil, tested by me (memset123) and the editorialist is rekt_n00b.

We did our best to prepare the contest so we hope you enjoy it and benefit from it. Looking forward to seeing you participate.

Good luck!
